long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple online job application assistant to ease repeated form filling and job tracking.

Easy-to-Use Dashboard: Access and manage your basic details in a separate tab with just one click.

Autofill Support: Currently supports auto-filling job applications on Ashby and Greenhouse.

More Platforms Coming Soon: We're continuously expanding support for additional Applicant Tracking Systems (ATS).

Your Privacy Matters: All your data is stored locally in your browser, ensuring it stays private and secure.

Start saving time on job applications today!
